summary: 2014 CHEVROLET EQUINOX.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO BROKEN BALL JOINT IN WIPER TRANSMISSION CAUSES WINDSHIELD VISIBILITY PROBLEMS.  CONSUMER STATES PAID FOR A REPAIR THAT SHOULD BE UNDER RECALL.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED A RECALL HAD BEEN ISSUED. HOWEVER, IT DID NOT INCLUDE HIS MODEL YEAR.  *JB
